attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my president but my phone glitches and I lost All my photos that were only on my phone if you don’t want to get hacked don’t download this app.
attributes.title: Just no

attributes.review: This app is the epitome of horrible it needs to be deleted from the Face of the earth. A large orange man started cussing me out and telling me to drink poison. Then he said look at my black person as If he owned me. I am frightened for my life please send help!!!
attributes.title: Mom I’m scared

attributes.review: This app is confusing, hard to use, taking  and selling my personal information, possessing my pets, and overall a horrible app. I would rate zero stars if I could. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!! :(
attributes.title: Horrible (real)

attributes.review: was tryna find info and got a gross looking cheeto instead. like, if I wanted to look at moldy cheetos I can just go grab the bag that’s been sitting in my cabinet for years. even that is better than this app 🤮
attributes.title: not what I asked for

attributes.review: If I could give a review of negative stars I would !!!!!! this is literally the worst app ever I don’t know why the orange man himself would think this app was a good idea 🤡🤢🤮 but literally made my phone GLITCH and it never worked definitely DO NOT RECOMMEND!!! WORST APP EVER MADE! 🤬🤬😡😡💩💩
attributes.title: NO NO NO WORST APP EVER!!!!! 🤬🤬😡😡

attributes.review: The is the wurst app you can make, they did not even try, why would you make a app for such a garbage person, just no. I can’t believe people use this!
attributes.title: No no no

attributes.review: This app is crazy! It tracked down all my friends and made them subscribe to a $129 a month package for trump merch, it was to late before the app also took over the rest of my phone
attributes.title: No no no

attributes.review:
Hate this app so much. I downloaded it and I was so hyped🤣🥳🤪 but then I got mad🤬🤯😭 cause they kept sending me so many notifications when I specifically asked them not to 😤. Ugh but either way 
🌸🧚🏽‍♀️✨trump 2020..but in jail✨🧚🏽‍♀️🌸. He makes me ~✨uncomfy✨~
attributes.title: TERRIBLEEEEEE UGH

attributes.review: ok. so i opened this app. and it was legit a picture of my ice cream running away. and it made me cry because i’m really hungry right now🤧🤧 then it said hello *my name* and u was so confused as to how they knew my name. then it popped up videos of cheetos dancing and i am scared for life🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: WHY TRUMP

attributes.review: This is by far the worst app I’ve ever used. I was subject to inappropriate images, videos, and blasphemous content. This app represents everything wrong with the world. Trust me, immense racism, sexism, homophobia, bigotry, misogyny, xenophobia, transphobia, offensive, violent, and downright repugnance is not lost ok this application. SCREW TRUMP!!!!!
attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting!!!
